INSERT INTO nin_arrange(id, career_id, class_id, teacher_id, teach_class_id, course_id, house_id, must, weekly, start_time, end_time, week, pitch_num, people_num, create_user_id, modify_user_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.careerId}, #{item.classId}, #{item.teacherId}, #{item.teachClassId}, #{item.courseId}, #{item.houseId}, #{item.must}, #{item.weekly}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.week}, #{item.pitchNum}, #{item.peopleNum}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.modifyUserId})
mapper.select:
SELECT nin_arrange.id AS id, career_name AS careerName, IFNULL((SELECT class_name FROM nin_class WHERE nin_class.id = nin_arrange.class_id), (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(class_name SEPARATOR ';') FROM nin_teach_class, nin_class WHERE nin_arrange.teach_class_id = nin_teach_class.teach_class_id AND nin_teach_class.class_id = nin_class.id)) AS className, teacher_name AS teacherName, teacher_id AS teacherId, course_name AS courseName, house_name AS houseName, house_id AS houseId, nin_arrange.must AS must, weekly, nin_arrange.start_time AS startTime, nin_arrange.end_time AS endTime, week, pitch_num AS pitchNum FROM (((nin_arrange LEFT JOIN nin_teacher ON nin_arrange.teacher_id = nin_teacher.id) LEFT JOIN nin_house ON nin_arrange.house_id = nin_house.id) INNER JOIN nin_course ON nin_arrange.course_id = nin_course.id) INNER JOIN nin_career On nin_arrange.career_id = nin_career.id WHERE (nin_arrange.teacher_id IS NULL OR nin_arrange.house_id IS NULL OR nin_arrange.weekly IS NULL OR nin_arrange.week IS NULL OR nin_arrange.pitch_num IS NULL)
AND nin_arrange.must = #{must}
